Hello traveler. I really appreciate all the help you gave me from last time. Thanks to your help, I was able to safely plant #t4031695#. Now I think it's time for it to bloom.
#t4031695# may be cold, but the flower can only be snapped away with a human's warm hand. If a Humanoid like me touches the flower... it'll break into pieces...
That is why I am here asking you... to snap #t4031695# away and give this to...#p2111004#.

#t4031695# is a brittle flower that can't bloom by itself. You'll need to acquire #t4000361# and place it on the scale where #t4031696# is asleep. When the flower blooms, snap #b#t4031695##k away, and hand it to #b#p2111004##k.
Come back and see me once you are ready to grow the rose from the snowfield. I'll take you to the place where it can be grown.
I understand if you find this too difficult. If I was a human, then I wouldn't have even asked you to do this...
...What is it? Is this... a flower? It's #t4031695#... This is a very precious flower. How did you get this? What? It's from #p2111003#?
This... is my favorite flower. I just don't know why he'd give me this... #p2111003#... He's a great person, I mean, a great Humanoid, but I already have a husband...
I don't think you have gone to see #b#p2111004##k yet. Please get #b#t4031695##k and give it to her. #t4031695# needs #b#t4000361##k in order to have a full bloom.
What is it? Please don't talk to me unless it's something important.
